author: ysqi

<!-- Feature Request -->
Hello - mRemoteNG is my favorite Remote Desktop client! Thanks you!

Would it be possible to request add control for SQL Server. i don't want other can update connect info . other people just can load and  refresh connect fro...

iterations.description: Feature request to add an option to disable saving configuration to SQL Server, allowing read-only SQL users without generating errors on save attempts

Feature already implemented: SQL Server options page has 'Access for Read Only' checkbox (chkSQLReadOnly) that suppresses all write/save operations to SQL database. Dual-layer protection in SqlConnectionsSaver.Save() and SqlDataProvider.Save(). Also supports registry/GPO enforcement. Available since v1.81.0-beta.2.

comments.author: ysqi
comments.snippet: will get error when exec save command by read-only user, but can continue use.

notes: ALREADY IMPLEMENTED: SQL Server options page has 'Access for Read Only' checkbox (chkSQLReadOnly) with tooltip 'Data from db will be loaded but not saved'. Setting persisted in Properties.OptionsDBsPage.Default.SQLReadOnly. Dual-layer write suppression: SqlConnectionsSaver.Save() line 45 and SqlDataProvider.Save() line 36 both check the flag and abort with informational messages. Registry/GPO enforcement supported via OptRegistrySqlServerPage.SQLReadOnly. Load operations work unconditionally (no read-only checks). No code changes needed.
